original_text: For Titus not only welcomed our appeal, but he is coming to you with much enthusiasm and on his own initiative.
korean_text: 그가 권함을 받고 더욱 간절함으로 자원하여 너희에게 나아갔고

sentences.original_text: For Titus not only welcomed our appeal
sentences.korean_translation: 디도가 우리의 호소를 받아들였을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: but he is coming to you
